divs: Sighting DetailsOK well agin a star like object appeired wile i was arguine wit my girlfreind .... an then i look up to the sky looking at the stars then one started to move slowly an i said shut up look at that ufo an she looked an i said cool i got u to see one at night time ... so we looked at it for less that a min an it woobled a bit an then it faded away not that far away from the moon .. so agin some one check out Pomona i promiss a lot of weired stuff in the skys check it out !!!!!!!!!!
